title: New Updates to Carolingian UI!
content:
Note: Only update to v2.x of my module after you upgrade Foundry to v13.
Updates from v1.16.6:

  • Discreet chat border: Your choice of border color can now apply to left side of chat only - enable this in chat settings;
  • New theme color: Added 'Gambit's Blue' theme in style settings;

Features from v1.16.0:

  • Floating Camera Dock: You can now choose to auto-resize the A/V floating camera dock horizontally or vertically based on the number of players online.

And a few other details and settings options! Check more on Github repo or Discord
